__inputs.description: Namespace associated with the Zenko instance
__inputs.label: namespace
__inputs.name: namespace

__inputs.description: Name of the Cloudserver job, used to filter only the Cloudserver instances.
__inputs.label: job
__inputs.name: job

__inputs.description: Prefix of the Cloudserver pod names, used to filter only the Cloudserver instances.
__inputs.label: pod
__inputs.name: pod

panels.description:
Number of S3 buckets available in the cluster.
This value is computed asynchronously, and update may be delayed up to 1h.
panels.title: Buckets

panels.description:
Number of S3 objects available in the cluster.
This value is computed asynchronously, and update may be delayed up to 1h.
panels.title: Objects

panels.description: Rate of data ingested out-of-band (OOB) : cumulative amount of OOB data created (>0) or freed (<0) per second.
panels.title: OOB Inject. Data Rate

panels.description: Rate of object ingested out-of-band (OOB) : cumulative count of OOB object created (>0) or freed (<0) per second.
panels.title: OOB Inject. Rate
